name: pdf-to-markdown
description: CLI tool to convert documents (PDF, images, etc.) to Markdown, HTML, JSON, Text, and Doctags using Docling

scripts.setup: npm install && pip install docling && (pip install --no-deps opencv-python-headless || pip install opencv-python-headless)
scripts.install:all: npm install && pip install docling && (pip install --no-deps opencv-python-headless || pip install opencv-python-headless)
